text:
@RandPaul Hey Rand, I like freedom as much ad anybody i guess.
But if you want to tweet advice on not getting coronavirus, you should maybe get a friend to tweet it.
Just saying.
u got cool hair. Mine is way thin!
#MAGA #Trump2020
